front.title: Transmission of IPv6 Packets over InfiniBand Networks

abstract.t: This document outlines all the necessary ingredients for running anIPv6 network on top of an InfiniBand (IB) network. It firstdescribes how IP link segments can be constructed out of IB subnetsand partitions, then specifies the method of forming IPv6 statelesslyautoconfigured addresses, link-local addresses, and the link-layeraddress format used in the Source/Target Link-layer Address option.It then describes how an IPv6 packet can be encapsulated in an IBpacket, both unicast and multicast.
